trends: There have been no other sightings in Amityville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was a kid, around nine years old, living on Long Island on a summer afternoon. I was playing in my backyard, when I heard police sirens and looked through the yard that backed mine to see a police car pull up in front of their house. I then saw movement up and to my left. It appeared to be a classic saucer shaped craft, coming up from the yard. It was silent and took off really fast. I would estimate it at about 20 feet in diameter. I ran into my house and told my mom, who said that I imagined it, and not to tell anyone. Years later, I asked her about it, and she said it was obvious that I had seen something, and that it shook her up. I recall this clearly to this day, and could still draw what I saw.
Summary: I've always wondered... what did I see?
